p: All chemicals used were analytical grade purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany). Silica gel (0.063â€“0.2 mm) and Sephadex LH-20 (Sigma-Aldrich, Darmstadt, Germany) were used as stationary phases and solvent mixtures described below were used as mobile phase in the chromatographic separations. Thin layer chromatography plates packed with silica gel (normal or reversed phase), were used to locate major components of the fractions.
